title: Aquarius Crop Hoodie
description: The water bearer flows through you. Aquarius doesn't carry water—they ARE the water, the life force, the current that nourishes all of humanity. Born under Uranus' revolutionary reign, they understand that true change flows like a river: persistent, unstoppable, reshaping everything it touches. This cropped hoodie channels Aquarian defiance through sacred water symbolism, wrapping visionary souls in comfort designed for those who refuse to follow the current—they create it.
mysticalCopy: Water is life. I am water. I flow where others fear to tread.
features: Premium cropped fit for modern style
Aquarius water bearer insignia centered on chest
'Water is life, I am water' manifestation text (hidden inner detail)
Soft fleece interior for all-day comfort
Available in Military Green and Storm colorways
Ribbed cuffs and hem for structured fit
Designed for rebels, visionaries, and future-builders
careInstructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Your revolutionary spirit never fades.
seoTitle: Aquarius Crop Hoodie | Water Bearer Design | Lyrīon Atelier
seoDescription: Channel Aquarian flow with the Crop Hoodie. Premium design for visionaries and revolutionaries ruled by Uranus. Water is life, I am water.
